__comment__: This file was automatically created by mcresources
name: Bread

pages.text: To make $(thing)Bread$(), one first must get $(thing)Yeast$(). To get your first yeast, seal $(l:firmalife:firmalife/drying)Dried Fruit$() in a Barrel of $(thing)Water$(). After three days, $(thing)Yeast Starter$() will form.$(br)From now on, your yeast can be fed by sealing Yeast Starter in a Barrel with $(thing)Flour$(). This causes it to multiply. 1 flour per 100mB of Yeast produces 600mB of Yeast. That's a good deal!
Yeast Starter, Sweetener, and Flour can be combined to make $(thing)Dough$(). Dough can be cooked like normal to produce $(thing)Bread!$().
